local_intent: Ensure the end effector is oriented to yaw 90 degrees; skip if already correct and verify after setting.
assumptions: Yaw rotation to 90 degrees is collision-free in the current pose
Controller exposes orientation feedback for verification
coherence_with_global: Implements the SetTCPYaw step in the global plan, with a pre-check to avoid redundant rotation and a post-check to confirm orientation before subsequent alignment and contact.
